Currently, he is in need of 2000 AZN to purchase summer clothing for sale. Elshan has been selling adult and children's clothing for the past 7 years. He would like to develop and expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for sale

loans.name: Kleyner Damian

texts.es:
Kleyner Damián tiene 19 años de edad es soltero, vive con sus padres en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.  
Kleyner Damián es guardia de seguridad.
Solicita el crédito para pagar medicamentos para su hermano que se encuentra entre la vida y la muerte.
Con la ayuda del crédito ayudara para pagar los medicamentos requeridos.
Las compras de medicamentos los realizan en Ventanas y Guayaquil.	
El  sueño es poder tener su propio negocio.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son los problemas de la salud.
En el tiempo libre le gusta estar tranquilo, descansando junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Kleyner Damián is 19 years old and single.  He lives with his parents in the canton Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos.  

Kleyner Damián is a security guard.  He is asking for this loan to buy medications for his brother, who is at death's door.  With the help of a loan, he will be able to help buy the medications required to help.  He will buy the medicines in Ventanas and Guayaquil.	

His dream is to own his own business.  The hardship he currently faces are these health problems.  In his free time he likes to be quiet and relax with his family.

loans.use: to pay for medications for his brother, who is at death's door.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La Sra. María, tiene 46 años, está casada con el Sr. Adolfo hace 18 años, del matrimonio nacieron tres  hijos, de los cuales uno falleció. 
La Sra. María Teresa  es comerciante hace más de 14 años, tiene dos salones comerciales en el Mercado Municipal  donde vende especies al por mayor y menor como: manzanillas, boldo, anís, eneldo, azafrán, semilla de lino, hierbas medicinales, pomadas, jarabes, entre otros productos naturales. Comenzó con un pequeño local con ventas al menudeo,  poco a poco fue creciendo con la clientela que formaba con mucho sacrificio,  empeño y la ayuda de su familia. Comenta que en esta época tiene mucha competencia por lo que hay que mejorar los precios y el servicio para mantener a la clientela. Ella con su carisma y amabilidad atiende personalmente junto con marido y también ayudan los hijos. 
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de manzanilla, boldo, anís, eneldo, azafrán, semilla de lino, hierbas medicinales, etc., con lo que podrá abastecerse y de esa forma tener buena variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en: María is 46 years old. She is married to Adolfo; they have been married for 18 years and had 3 children, one of which passed away. She has been a businesswoman for the past 14 years. She has two commercial spaces that are located in the municipal market, where she sells medicinal herbs for wholesale and retail purchases. She sells chamomile, boldo, anise, dill, saffron, flax seed, herbs, ointments, syrups, and other natural products. She started with a small store. doing retail sales. Little by little she has grown her customer base, with much sacrifice, dedication and help from her family. She said that right now she has a lot of competition, and knows that she will need to improve her prices and provide great service in order to retain her customers. With her charisma and friendly nature, she helps customers along side her husband and her children who also help. She requested a loan to buy chamomile, boldo, anise, dill, saffron, flax seed and other medicinal herbs. This will allow her to stock her stores, which will help her to have a good variety of products to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy chamomile, boldo, anise, dill, saffron, flax seed, and other medicinal herbs.

loans.name: Laura

texts.es:
Laura  es una mujer de 70 años de edad, es casada y tiene 2 hijos, ninguno a su cargo. Vive en casa propia junto a su esposo en el pueblo joven Santa Rosa, en el distrito de Morropón. Cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales. Su comunidad es grande, sin embargo, su vivienda es precaria.
Laura se dedica a la comercialización de animales menores, tales como  porcinos, caprinos, gallinas, entre otros desde hace 4 años en el distrito de Morropón. Engorda a los animales hasta que alcancen su talla y peso ideal para comercializarlos en el mercado local.
El monto del préstamo es de 2000 nuevos soles, el cual solicita para invertirlo en su negocio, específicamente para la compra  ovejas, chivos, chanchos, ya que están a un buen precio, para que de esa manera tenga mejores ingresos y en consecuencia una mejor condición de vida en la zona.
La inversión en el negocio, la ayudará a tener mejores utilidades, ya que el mercado  es bueno para este tipo de negocio, pues en su mayoría los habitantes se dedican  a la crianza y por ende a la comercialización de animales menores.
texts.en:
Laura is a 70 year old woman; she's married and has two children, neither of whom are still in her care.  She lives in her own home with her husband in the new town of Santa Rosa, in the district of Morropón.  She has good work and personal references.  Her community is large, yet her place in it is precarious.

Laura is engaged in the sale of young animals, some of which are pigs, goats, hens, and others for the past four years in the Morropón district.  She fattens the animals until they reach their full size and ideal weight to be sold in the local market.

The total sum of her loan is 2000 Soles, which she is asking for to invest in her business, specifically to buy sheep, goats, and pigs since they are at a good price so that she can have a greater profit margin and, as a result, a better life in her hometown.  Her investment in the business will help her to have better profits, since the market is good for this type of business venture, since mostly the people of her village are involved in raising animals and therefore sell smaller animals.

loans.use: to invest in new animals like sheep, goats, and pigs to sell in the local market.

loans.name: Jipargul

texts.ru: Жыпаргул 53 года, замужем, воспитала 3 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Жыпаргул занимается животноводством.  Начатое 30 лет  назад со стартовой суммы в 1,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство  на сегодня приносит около 6,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. На сегодня в хозяйстве Жыпаргул имеется 2 коровы, 2 лошади и 15 овец.  В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Жыпаргул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телки и бычков на откорм и перепродажу. Доходы Жыпаргул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Jipargul is 53 years old, married and has raised three children. To provide income for her family, Jipargul works in animal husbandry. Starting 30 years ago with an initial sum of 1,000 som (KGS), today the farm brings in around 6,000 som (KGS) a month from selling milk and dairy products. Today on her farm, Jipargul has 2 cows, 2 horses and 15 sheep. In order to grow her business, Jipargul has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 130,000 som to purchase heifers and bulls for fattening and resale. With the income, Jipargul plans to invest in the farm's future growth.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Rahmatullo

texts.ru: Рахматулло житель Яванского района. Ему 46 лет. Он женат. У него семеро детей. Он предоставляет услугу, он сварщик. Кроме того у него имеется мельница, где он изготавливает муку. Этим видом деятельности занимается год. Кредит берет для закупа пшеницы.
texts.en: Rahmatullo lives in the Yavan region. He is 46 years old, married with seven children. He is a welder. Besides this, he has a mill where he produces flour. He has been in this line of work for a year. He is requesting a loan to purchase wheat.

loans.use: purchase wheat

loans.name: Ibodat

texts.ru: Ибодат жительница города Худжанд. Ей 55 лет. Она вдова. У нее четверо детей. Она занимается торговлей на рынке. В основном она продает носки и женскую обувь. Этим видом деятельности занимается более 30 лет. Кредит берет для покупки сезонного товара.
texts.en: Ibodat lives in the city of Khujand. She is 55 years old. She is a widow with four children. She is a merchant in the market. In general, she sells socks and women's shoes. She has been in this line of work for more than 30 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase seasonal goods.

loans.use: purchase men's and women's t-shirts,  shirts, socks and stockings

loans.name: Boturkhon

texts.ru: Бохтурхон житель района Хамадони. Он женат. Ему 41 год. У него четверо детей. Он предоставляет услугу, такси. В этой области имеет богатый опыт. Кредит берет для ремонта автомашины.
texts.en: Boturkhon lives in the Hamadoni region. He is 41 years old and married with four children. He offers taxi services and has a lot of experience in this field. He is requesting a loan for car repairs.

loans.use: pay for car repairs

loans.name: Jose Miguel

texts.es:
José Miguel tiene 22 años de edad tiene un hijo es soltero, vive con sus padres en la ciudad de  Guaranda Provincia de BOLÌVAR.
José Miguel trabaja como albañil mediante contratos.
Solicita el crédito para comprar una moto y herramientas como martillo, serruchos, desarmador, llave inglesa,  de trabajo para facilitar su medio de transporte y para el bienestar de su familia.
Con la ayuda del crédito podrá tener mayores ingresos y beneficio para si mismo, para dar la educación a su hijo y ayudar a su familia.
Las compras de las herramientas lo realizan frecuentemente en la ciudad de Ventanas.
El sueño es poder comprar un vehículo para uso exclusivo y comodidad para el y su familia.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las malas condiciones climáticas.
En el tiempo libre le gusta estar tranquilo, descansando, y mirando televisión.
texts.en:
José Miguel is 22 years old and is single with one son.  He lives with his parents in the city of Guaranda, in the Bolívar province.

José Miguel works as a contracted construction worker.  He is asking for a loan to buy himself a motorcycle and tools like a hammer, saws, a screwdriver, and a monkey wrench for his work to make it easier for him to travel and for the well-being of his family.

With the help of this loan, he will be able to make more profits for himself to give an education to his son and help out his family.  He is usually able to buy his tools in Ventanas.

His dream is to buy a personal vehicle for his sole use and for his family's convenience.  His greatest struggles currently are with the bad weather.  In his free time he likes to sit quietly, relaxing and watching television.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle and tools like a hammer, hand saws, a screwdriver, and monkey wrench.

loans.name: Rosa Magali

texts.es:
Rosa M. es una mujer en estado civil de separación, tiene 2 hijos a su cargo, de 12 y 9 años de edad respectivamente. Es conocida en su comunidad urbana y tiene buenas relaciones vecinales, así como también buenas referencias personales y laborales.
Rosa M.  dedicada a la fabricación de productos de cerámica para bautizos, matrimonios. Tiene una experiencia de 4 años en el negocio. Su actividad la realiza en su domicilio ubicado en el distrito de Picsi - Chiclayo.
El monto del crédito desembolsado sería de 2000 nuevos soles, los cuales serían invertidos para la compra de insumos para una mejor producción de objetos cerámicos y así mejorar su calidad de vida y aumentar la satisfacción de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Rosa M. is a woman who is legally separated. She has two children in her care, ages 12 and 9. She is known in her urban community and has good relationships with her neighbors as well as good personal and work references.

Rosa M. makes ceramic products for baptisms and weddings. She has four years of experience in this business. She does her work in her home, which is located in the district of Picsi, Chiclayo.

The amount of the loan disbursed will be 2000 PEN, which will be invested in the purchase of supplies for a better production of ceramic objects, thus improving her quality of life and the satisfaction of her customers.

loans.use: to buy supplies for the fabrication of ceramic products and thus improve her quality of life and the satisfaction of her customers.

loans.name: Monica Natali

texts.es:
Mónica es una persona alegre, responsable, felíz y trabajadora. Mónica tiene 20 años vive con sus padres en Latacunga provincia de Cotopaxi.

Mónica trabaja con sus padres en la crianza y venta de ganado, este negocio ayuda a solventar los gastos de sus estudios y necesidades de su hogar, en vista que necesita dinero para seguir con sus estudios Mónica decide realizar un crédito a Fodemi el mismo que va a ser invertido en la compra de vaca lechera, para producción y venta de leche, lo que generará mayores ingresos y permitirán mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de sus padres.

Mónica sueña con ser una buena profesional y poder formar un hogar.
texts.en:
Mónica is a cheerful, responsible, happy, and hardworking person.  Mónica is 20 years old and lives with her parents in Latacunga in the province of Cotopaxi.

Mónica works with her parents raising and selling cattle, this work helps to pay for her studies and the household expenses.  Realizing that she will need money to continue her studies, Mónica has decided to ask for a loan from Fodemi which she will invest to buy a milch cow to produce milk for sale.  This will generate more income and allow her and her family to have a better quality of life.

Mónica dreams of becoming a businesswoman and being able to have her own home.

loans.use: to grow her business by buying a milch cow for the production and sale of milk.

loans.name: Lasso El Vergel Group

texts.es:
El Grupo Solidario Lasso El Vergel está conformado por cuatro personas que tienen un mismo fin que es el de triunfar en la vida y sacar adelante a sus familias. En este grupo la presidenta es Gladys debido a que es una persona responsable, trabajadora y con grandes aspiraciones en la vida, Gladys es viuda, vive solo con sus dos hijos en la ciudad de Latacunga en la Provincia de Latacunga.

Gladys trabaja sola en la crianza y venta de cerdos, este negocio es la única fuente de ingresos económicos que tiene su familia y con esto tiene que sustentar todos los gastos de su hogar como alimentación,estudios de sus hijos etc. Es el primer crédito que realiza en Fodemi el mismo que va a ser utilizado en la compra de balanceado para alimentación de los cerdos y para la compra de crías de cerdos para su crianza y posteriormente para reproducción y venta, que ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.

En la fotografía Gladys es la señora de saco lila.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Lasso El Vergel is formed by four people that have the same purpose, which is to triumph in life and get their families ahead. In this group the president is Gladys because she is a responsible, hard-working person with big aspirations in life. Gladys is widowed and lives alone with her two children in the city of Latacunga in the province of Latacunga.

Gladys works alone in the rearing and sale of pigs.  This business is the only source of economic income that her family has and with this she has to maintain all of her home expenses, like food, schooling of her children, etc. It is the first loan that she is carrying out with Fodemi, which will be used to buy feed for the pigs, and to buy young pigs to rear and later reproduce and sell, which will help to improve her income and her quality of life.

In the photo Gladys is the woman with the purple sack.

loans.use: to buy young pigs to raise and later for reproduction and sale.

loans.name: Ekoué

texts.fr:
Ekoué est un homme âgé de 34 ans. Il est marié å une infographiste. Il a 2 enfants, dont 1 à l’école. Le premier a 4 ans et le dernier a 2 ans.
Ekoué travaille comme gérant depuis 2011. Il gère un cyber pour tous clients dans sa boutique. Il travaille seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est le manque d’argent.
Ekoué a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’établir sa carte d’opérateur économique et son autorisation d’installation. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Ekoué voudrait ouvrir un établissement de gestion des PME et PMI. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit d’assurer l’avenir de sa famille et construire une maison.
texts.en:
Ekoué is a 34-year-old man who is married to a computer graphics designer. He has two children, of whom one is in school. The first child is 4 years old, and the last is 2. Ekoué has been working as a manager since 2011. He manages an internet cafe in his store. He works alone. At the moment, his main difficulty is a lack of money. 

Ekoué has requested his first loan from WAGES to obtain his Economic Operator Card and authorization to set up businesses. He wants to reinvest in his business.

In the next few years, Ekoué would like to open a company for managing "PME/PMI" [small and medium enterprises/ small and medium industries]. With the profits, he says he plans to ensure his family's future and to build a house.

loans.use: to obtain an Economic Operator Card and authorization to set up businesses

loans.name: Aminata

texts.fr:
Madame Aminata est une femme brave âgée de 45 ans, mariée et mère de 9 enfants dont l’ainé est âgée de 20 ans et le cadet 2 ans. Son activité consiste à vendre du poisson frais ou elle a acquis une expérience de 4 ans. Elle commence sa journée à 8 h pour la terminer à 12h. Elle a acquis une forte clientèle car la zone ou elle habite est un peu éloignée du marché. 
Elle sollicite un crédit de 150000 FCFA pour pouvoir acheter  du poisson noble en caisse. Elle n’a pas de charges car son mari s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne. Elle ne  s’occupe que de ses charges personnelles. Elle a comme projet futur de construire une maison pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ms. Aminata is a good and honest woman, 45 years old, who is a married mother with nine children. The oldest child is  20 years old, and the youngest is 2. Her business consists in selling fresh fish. She has acquired four years of experience in this business. Her days starts at 8:00 in the morning and finishes as noon. She has acquired a strong customer base because the area where she lives is not far from the market. 

Ms. Aminata is requesting a loan of 150,000 francs CFA to buy some quality fish in boxes. She has no expenses since her husband takes care of day-to-day expenses. She only takes care of her personal expenses. 

Her future plans include building a house for her children.

loans.use: to buy fresh fish to resell

loans.name: Esperanza De Collpani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ESPARANZA DE COLLPANI” iniciará su vigésimo cuarto ciclo  en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Collpani, está compuesta por once integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Santusa. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: comerciante, venta de comida, conductor de micro, venta de repuestos, artesanías, librería y punto VIVA, venta de abarrotes, venta de jarabe, venta de ropa.

La señora Santusa, indica que hace cinco años que integra una asociación comunal en Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comidas que viene trabajando hace años, aprendiendo el mismo de su madre.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de su capital, (compra de víveres), mismo que comprará de la feria paceña y posteriormente  a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de comercialización. Este negocio le ayuda a apoyar a su familia pues ella es soltera y tiene cuatro hijos.
  
Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación y relación de amigos.
texts.en:
The “Esparanza De Collpani” [“Hope of Collpani] group will begin its twenty-fourth loan cycle with Pro Mujer.  It is part of the Collpani regional office and is made up of eleven members, who are managed by a board that is headed by Santusa.  The members of the group are involved in various types of businesses, including running a store, serving as a minibus conductor, running a bookstore with telephone services, and selling items such as food, spare parts, handicrafts, groceries, syrup, and clothing.

Santusa says that she has worked with Pro Mujer for five years, and that she joined the organization after a friend invited her.  Her business is selling food, which she has done for years, since she learned the business from her mother who also sold food. 

Santusa will use the loan to increase her working capital so she can purchase supplies.  She plans to purchase the items she needs at a street market in La Paz and then prepare and sell the food at her shop.  This business helps her to support her family, since she is a single mother and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Santusa answered that she likes the training and the organization’s friendly relationship with its members.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for her food business.

loans.name: Koffi

texts.fr:
Koffi est un homme âgé de 27 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a 2 enfants, dont 1 à l’école. Le premier a 5 ans et le dernier a 10 mois.
Koffi travaille comme revendeur depuis 2011. Il vend de l’eau de vie pour tous clients à domicile. Il achète les produits à Lomé. Il travaille seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la rupture de stock.
Koffi a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter de l’eau de vie. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Koffi voudrait se diversifier et ouvrir une quincaillerie. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit de construire une maison.
texts.en:
Koffi is a 27-year-old man who is married to a retailer. He has two children, of whom one is in school. The first child is 5 years old, and the last is 10 months old. Koffi has been working as a retailer since 2011. He sells brandy to all comers to his home. He purchases the products in Lomé. He works by himself. At the moment, his main difficulty is an inventory shortage.

Koffi has requested his first loan from WAGES to buy brandy. He wants to reinvest in his business. 

In the next few years, Koffi would like to diversify and to open a hardware store. With the profits, he says he plans to build a house.

loans.use: to buy alcoholic beverages

loans.name: Yaovi

texts.fr:
Yaovi est un homme âgé de 36 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse. Il a 2 enfants, dont 1 à l’école. Le premier a 6 ans et le dernier a 3 ans. 
Yaovi travaille comme mécanicien depuis 1998. Il vend des pièces détachées pour tous clients dans sa boutique. Il achète les produits à Lomé. Il travaille seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est le manque d’argent pour constituer un stock considérable.
Yaovi a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des pièces détachées. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Yaovi voudrait ouvrir une boutique. Il dit qu’avec les profits, Il prévoit d’assurer les besoins de sa famille et acheter un terrain.
texts.en:
Yaovi is a 36-year-old man who is married to a retailer. He has two children, of whom one is in school. The first child is 6 years old, and the last is 3. Yaovi has been working as a mechanic since 1998. He sells spare parts to anyone in his store. He purchases the products in Lomé. He works by himself. At the moment, his main difficulty is a lack of money to build up a significant inventory.

Yaovi has requested his first loan from WAGES to buy some spare parts. He wants to reinvest in his business.  

In the next few years, Yaovi would like to open a store. With the profits, he says he plans to ensure his family's needs are covered and to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy spare parts

loans.name: Titomagba 1 Group

texts.fr: TITOMAGBA 1 est un groupement de quatorze personnes, dont les membres habitent dans la même agglomération et exercent des activités génératrices de revenus. La représentante du groupement, Marguérite (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 42 ans. Marguérite est mariée à un certain Appolinaire. Le couple a cinq enfants dont quatre sont à leur charge. Certains enfants parmi les cinq sont scolarisés. Marguérite vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari et assure avec son mari les diverses charges de la maison. Marguérite n’a jamais fréquenté l’école. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Marguérite vend de la farine de manioc et de façon secondaire de l’huile de palme dans une région du Benin depuis près de vingt ans. Marguérite s’approvisionne au Benin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue d’élargir son activité, Marguérite sollicite un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement TITOMAGBA 1. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits.
texts.en:
"TITOMAGBA 1" is a group composed of fourteen persons whose members live in the same town and who have revenue-generating businesses. The group's representative, Marguérite (whose hand is raised in the photo), is 42 years old and married to a man named Appolinaire. They have five children, of whom four are in their care. Some of the children are in school. Marguérite lives together with her children and husband and ensures, along with her husband, that the diverse household expenses are covered. 

To cope with her different expenses, Marguérite has been selling cassava flour and palm oil secondarily, in a region of Benin for nearly twenty years. She gets her supplies in Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers, and with the aim of expanding her business, Marguérite is requesting, along with the other members of the group TITOMAGBA 1, an initial loan from ALIDé. This loan will serve to respond better to the demands of their customers and to make more profit.

loans.use: to buy palm oil and cassava flour

loans.name: José Claudio

texts.es: José, tiene la edad  de 50 años, está casado,  vive con su señora que es su mayor prioridad. El con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra para realizar la siembra de chile y tomate, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que quiere es poder comprar los mejores productos y de buena calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad, además tener a corto plazo una buena producción. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: José is 50 years old, married and lives with his wife who is his main priority. With the loan, he will buy fertilizers and pay for labor to sow chilies and tomatoes in order to do a good job. What José wants is to be able to buy the best products and quality so that his crops will grow well and be healthy. In the short run, he wishes to have a good harvest. This is his first loan through FUDECOSUR, he has not received any other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR gave him the loan easily with lower interest rates.

loans.use: sow chilies and tomatoes.

loans.name: Saldivar Poty Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Saldivar Poty, se conformo en el año 2007, tiene como miembros a 16 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 16º ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa. Ellas son mujeres muy unidas y lo han demostrado en los ciclos que vienen pasando.
La Sra. Maria Esther, quien se dedica a la elaboración y venta de artículos de limpieza, es una persona con muchos sueños y metas y por ellos siempre se esfuerza, además de eso quiere poder dar a su familia todo lo que ellos se merecen para una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de aromatizantes, cloro, lavandinas y demás insumos que necesite para seguir haciendo los productos de limpieza que ella vende. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo, pues le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The Committee of Women named "Saldivar Poty" was formed in 2007. This group has 16 members who are working comfortably in their 16th loan cycle of the program. They are a cooperative and close-knit group. These women are united and have demonstrated this quality in previous loan cycles.

Sra. Maria Esther produces and sells cleaning products. She is a person with many dreams and goals, and she always strives to achieve them. In addition, she want to provide her entire family with everything they need to have a decent and full life. Maria is requesting a loan to buy fragrances, bleach, cleaning agents, and other supplies that she needs to continue making cleaning products to sell. She is grateful for this opportunity she has received, which will be of great help.

loans.use: to buy fragrances, bleach, cleaning agents, and other supplies for making cleaning products.

loans.name: Yorlene

texts.es: Yorlene, tiene la edad  de 36 años, está casado,  vive con su esposo y sus hijos los cuales son su mayor prioridad. El con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de terneros para el engorde, y de esta manera asegurarse de adquirir animales de buena calidad. Lo que quiere es poder asegurarse de comprar terneros saludables y que tengan un buen desarrollo y de carne de buena calidad, además tener a mediano plazo terneros listos para la venta. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Yorlene is 36 years old, married and lives with her husband and children who are her main priority. With the loan, Yorlene wants to buy calves to fatten up, this will ensure that she will be able to have the best quality animals by buying them healthy and raise them well to have good quality meat and have them ready to sell. This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR, and she has not had any other loans in state banks but FUDECOSUR gave her the loan easily with lower interest rates.

loans.use: buy calves to fatten them up.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
El señor José Luis , nació en la provincia de Urubamba, del Departamento del Cusco en Perú, ahora con 21 años de edad, soltero, su actividad principal es la agricultura, tambien comercia con la compra y venta de maíz,  para ello necesita realizar un préstamo, el cual le permita hacerse de un capital económico para poder comprar la semilla de maíz, hacerla secar y finalmente venderla a los productores agrícolas de la zona, ya que en esta latitud es la principal actividad agrícola, por la calidad del grano de maíz.
El Señor José Luis posee un gran entusiasmo al comentar sobre su actividad y cree que contando con un apoyo económico mediante un préstamo de dinero, él podrá adquirir un mejor producto, el cual le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos  progresivamente, desarrollar su actividad y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su entorno familiar.
texts.en:
Mr. José Luis was born in the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco in Perú. He is 21 years old, single and works in agriculture as well as buying and selling corn. He needs a loan that will allow him to have enough capital to buy the corn seeds, dry them and finally sell them to the agricultural producers in the area since it is mainly an agricultural region for the quality of the corn.

Mr. José Luis is very enthusiastic when talking about his work and believes that with the financial support through the loan he will be able to buy a better product that will let him improve his income little by little, develop his trade, and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: buy corn seeds.

loans.name: Flory Haydee

texts.es: Flory, tiene la edad  de 54 años, está soltera,  vive con sus hijos que son su mayor prioridad. Ella con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y pagar mano de obra para la asistencia de café, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que quiere es poder comprar los mejores productos y de buena calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad, además tener a corto plazo una buena producción. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Flory is 54 years old, single and lives with her children who are her main priority. With the loan she hopes to buy fertilizers and pay for labor to help her coffee crops and ensure that she will do a good job. She wants to buy the best quality products so that her crops will grow well and healthily as well as having a good harvest in the short term. This is her first loan through FUDECOSUR, and she has not received any other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR gave her the loan easily with lower interest rates.

loans.use: improve her coffee crops.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is a farmer from Trinidad, Bohol. She is 49 years old, married and has a 23-year-old child. 

Gemma primarily grows rice crops to sell. She also started raising pigs to help augment her income. 

Gemma works hard to support her family. She has applied for a loan to purchase pigs and vitamins. Gemma hopes to have a successful business. She also dreams to be abroad with her family.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and vitamins.

loans.name: Agustina

texts.en: Agustina is 49 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 10 children. Agustina has a food/retail shop (or sari-sari store) that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo and beverages. Agustina has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Agustina hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, shampoo, soap and beverages.

loans.name: Mileidy

texts.es: Mileidy, tiene la edad  de 26 años, está casada,  vive con su esposo e hijo que son su mayor prioridad. Ella con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de madera y pagar mano de obra para la reparación de su casa, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que quiere es poder comprar los mejores materiales y de buena calidad para que su casa quede en buen estado y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Mileidy is 26 years old, married and lives with her husband and son who are her main priority. With her loan she wants to buy lumber and labor to repair her home and make sure that the work will be done well. She wants to buy the best quality materials so that her house will be better and improve her quality of life. This is her first loan through FUDECOSUR, and she has not received any other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR gave her the loan easily with lower interest rates.

loans.use: improve her home.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is 44 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. Susan has a food/retail shop (or sari-sari) store that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo and beverages. Susan has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Susan hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, cereals, shampoo, soap and beverages.

loans.name: Shirley Raquel

texts.es: Shirley Raquel, tiene la edad  de 32 años, está casada,  vive con sus cinco hijos y el esposo  actualmente. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar insumos como abonos, herbicidas, foliares y ayudarse con la mano de obra y comprar una bomba para echar la herbicida. Ella tiene pensado comprar los insumos para darle el mantenimiento adecuado al café y  poder obtener una plantación de muy buena calidad,  y así poder obtener una mejor producción y obtener más ganancias  para obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Shirley Raquel is 32 years old, married and lives with her five children and husband. With the loan she wishes to buy materials like manure, herbicides, foliage, and labor as well as buying a pump to distribute the herbicide. Shirley Raquel needs the materials to adequately maintain her coffee crops and have a good quality harvest, a better product and more income to have a better quality of life and financial stability. This is her first loan through FUDECOSUR, she has not received any other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR gave her the loan easily with lower interest rates.

loans.use: buy materials like manure, herbicides, foliage, and labor.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Diaby

texts.fr:
Madame Diaby est une jeune dame de 34 ans qui fait de la vente de draps cousus par elle-même. Elle a une expérience de 6 ans dans ce domaine. Elle reçoit beaucoup de commande c’est pourquoi elle demande l’appui de l’IMCEC pour obtenir un financement de 200000Fcfa afin de pouvoir acheter des tissus, du fil, de les tricoter en draps et de les revendre.
Avec  le crédit, elle va pouvoir améliorer son épargne et augmenter son pouvoir d'achat. Et résoudre ses besoins personnelles car la dépense quotidienne est assurée par son époux. Elle nourri un grand projet :celui d’ouvrir  un atelier de couture artisanale.
texts.en:
Diaby, age 34, is a young woman who sells home-made bedsheets.  She has a 6-year experience in this field and receives many orders, which is why she is requesting assistance from UIMCEC.  She would like to obtain a loan of 200,000 francs for the purchase of fabrics and thread, in order to make bedsheets for resale.

Thanks to her loan, she will be able to increase her savings and purchasing power.  She will also be able to take care of her own needs, since daily expenses are covered by her husband.  Her long-term project is to open a sewing crafts workshop.

loans.use: to buy fabrics in order to sew home-made bedsheets for resale

loans.name: Virgen Del Lujan Group

texts.es:
El comite se destaca por su entuciasmo y por la energia de trabajar juntas. Son mujeres jefas de familia que tienen a su cargo mantener la casa y dar el pan de cada día a sus familias. El objetivo de ellas es poder ir creciendo y darles un mejor estilo de vida a sus familias.
La señora Petrona es la presidenta del grupo, ella nos cuenta que hace todo lo posible para motivar siempre a sus amigas y de esa forma ir progresando dentro del programa. Ella tiene una despensa y comenta que por medio de este negocio ha podido salir adelante y ayudar a su familia y obtener los gastos del día a día.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, lácteos y demás insumos necesarios para poder seguir teniendo bien abastecido su local.
texts.en:
The communal bank is emphasized for their enthusiasm and energy for working together. The women are heads of family that are in charge of caring for the home and providing daily bread for their families. Their goal is to keep growing as businesswomen and to provide their families a better quality of life.

Mrs. Petrona is the president of the group and tells us that she does everything possible to motivate her friends and to keep improving within the program. She needs to buy food for her pantry and says that through her business she has been able to get ahead, help her family and have enough to meet her day to day expenses.

Mrs. Petrona needs the loan to buy foodstuffs, beverages, dairy and other products needed to keep her small store well stocked.

loans.use: buy foodstuffs, beverages, dairy and other products.

loans.name: Carla Vanessa

texts.es: Carla Vanessa, tiene la edad  de 20 años, está soltera,  vive con sus dos padres y tres hermanos  actualmente. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar tela para hacer ropa interior y además comprar ropa juvenil de hombre y de mujer para revenderla. Ella tiene pensado comprar ropa y tela al por mayor para que le sea más cómodo y obtener más ganancias y poder vender la mercancía en el mercado de la localidad y alrededores,  para obtener buenas ganancias y una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Carla Vanessa is 20 years old, single and lives with her two parents and three siblings. She wants to use the loan to buy fabric to make underwear and buy youthful clothing for men and women to resell. She hopes to buy clothing and fabric wholesale so that it will be more comfortable and have more earnings to sell merchandize in the local and nearby markets to have good earnings, a better quality of life and economic stability. This is her first loan through FUDECOSUR, she has not received any other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR gave her the loan easily with lower interest rates.

loans.use: buy fabric and clothing to resell.

loans.name: Miguel Algel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel, tiene la edad  de 45 años, está soltero,  vive con sus padres  actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar la semilla y las bolsas para hacer el almacigo y además comprar  insumos  como abonos, herbicidas, fumigaciones y mano de obra y además necesita comprar unas palas y cuchillos y un carretillo para jalar la tierra para el almasigo., El tiene pensado comprar la semilla y las bolsas para hacer el almacigó y con los insumos  poder obtener una plantación de muy buena calidad,  y así poder venderla a un excelente precio al mercado de la localidad, así poder  obtener más ganancias  para obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Miguel Ángel is 45 years old, single and lives with his parents. With the loan he wants to buy seeds and bags to make the seed bed, as well as materials like manure, herbicides, fumigate, labor, shovels, knives and a wheelbarrow to carry the dirt for the bed. He hopes to buy seeds and bags to make the bed and with the other materials work to have a great harvest and sell it at an excellent price to the local market to have more earnings and subsequently have a better quality of life and economic stability. This is his first loan through FUDECOSUR, he has not received any other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR gave him the loan easily with lower interest rates.

loans.use: buy seeds and farming materials.

loans.name: Delia Fermina

texts.es: Delia de 75 años de edad, se dedica a la fabricación de productos fritos, pasteles, tamales, carnes y derivados de la harina de trigo, que ella misma prepara y vende en la terraza de su casa, ubicada en el municipio de Soledad,  en un punto de alta afluencia de personas entre estudiantes y conductores que son altamente consumidores y potencializan el éxito diario de sus  ventas. Su meta es continuar ampliándolo, para lograr una mayor prosperidad y adecuar las habitaciones de su vivienda que den mayor confort a su familia. Su mayor desafío es la estacionalidad de sus ventas, porque le crea dependencia de un mimo mercado y de las jornadas escolares; por eso ella planea lograr nuevos mercados, pero su capital de trabajo se torna insuficiente para hacer inversiones y tener una mayor oferta de productos. En la actualidad está aplicando  a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará maíz, carne, cerdo, pollo, carbón en mayor volumen, con lo cual disminuiría los costos pues obtendría precios mas competitivos en sus compras, lo cual es la razón del éxito de esta inversión.
texts.en:
Delia is 75 years old and works producing fried foods, cakes, tamales, meat, and wheat flour products. She prepares and sells them herself from the balcony of her house, located in the municipality of Soledad. This is an area with an influx of people from students to drivers who are high consumers and who promote the daily success of her sales.

Her goal is to continue expanding her business to achieve greater prosperity, and to remodel the rooms in her home so that they are more comfortable for her family. Her greatest challenge is the seasonal variation in her sales, because it makes her dependent on the same market and on the school schedules. Because of this, she plans to attain new markets, but the income from her work is insufficient to make investments and offer a wider variety of products. 

Currently, she is requesting a loan financed by Fundación Mario Santo Domingo (FMSD) that she will use to buy greater amounts of corn, meat, pork, chicken, and charcoal. This will reduce her expenses, as she will obtain more competitive prices for her purchases, which is the reason for the success of this loan.

loans.use: to buy greater amounts of corn, meat, pork, chicken, and charcoal.

loans.name: Bineta

texts.fr: Madame Bineta  est âgée  de 53 ans et s’active depuis plus de 16 ans dans le secteur du commerce. Elle vend des habits de friperie. Elle a choisi son activité par passion et  sous l’ influence d’un proche,  mais aussi a cause de son aspect lucratif car ce sont les revenus qu’elle gagne qui lui permettent de régler beaucoup de ses problèmes financiers. Elle est membre de l’un des guichets de  l’U-IMCEC depuis novembre 2011. Elle sollicite un crédit de 200 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de marchandises  de friperie qui seront destinées à la vente. Le développement de son activité et l’accroissement de ses bénéfices lui permettront  d’améliorer ses conditions de vie sociale.
texts.en:
Bineta is 53 years old, and she has been actively involved in retail business for over 16 years.  She sells used clothing.  Following the advice of a close relative, she chose this activity because she enjoys it very much, but also because of its lucrative aspect.  Indeed, it is thanks to the income generated through this activity that she is able to solve many of her financial difficulties.

Bineta has been a member of one of the branches of UIMCEC since November 2011.  She is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs for the purchase of used clothing for resale.  She wishes to expand her business and to increase her profits in order to improve her social and living conditions.

loans.use: to buy used clothes for resale.

loans.name: Rosales Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ROSALES” iniciará su segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, está compuesta por siete integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Victoria Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de carne, venta de frazadas, comercio, producción y servicios.

La señora Victoria,  indica que este es el séptimo año que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su comadre. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de frazadas, que inicio conjuntamente su tía.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de frazadas), que comprara de la ciudad de Oruro y los venderán en las ferias de fin de semana. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la atención y las capacitaciones.
texts.en:
The communal bank, “ROSALES” will begin their second loan cycle with Pro Mujer as a part of the Centro Senkata. It is made up of seven members and is managed by a board headed by Mrs. Victoria. The businesses of the members of the communal bank are different; they sell meat, blankets, and are in sales, production and services.

Mrs. Victoria says this is her seventh loan with Pro Mujer; she joined the group by her friend’s invitation. At present she has a business selling blankets that she started with her aunt.

The loan will be used to increase her stock (by buying blankets) by buying in the city of Oruro and selling the items during the weekend fairs. This trade allows her to have enough income to support her family as much as possible since she is married and has three children.

When asked what she enjoys of Pro Mujer, Mrs. Victoria says that she enjoys the attention and the training.

loans.use: buy blankets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy materials and a motor pump.

loans.name: Mariétou

texts.fr: Madame Mariétou est âgée  de 46 ans. Elle vit au Sénégal. Elle est mariée et  évolue dans le commerce depuis 20 ans. Elle exerce la vente d’habits,  de tissus bazins ou teintés. Elle fait le tour des foires qui sont organisées dans les différents pays limitrophes du Sénégal. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis février 2012. Elle sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de marchandises qu’elle commercialise. Son souhait est de développer davantage son activité de commerce, d’accroitre ses bénéfices en vue d’améliorer ses conditions de vie économique et sociale.
texts.en:
Mariétou is 46 years old and lives in Senegal.  She is married and has been involved in retail business for the past twenty years.  She sells clothes, as well as dyed and "bazin" (damasked) fabrics.  She visits the trade shows that are organized in the various countries bordering Senegal.  

Mariétou has been a member of one of the branches of UIMCEC since February 2012 and she is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs for the purchase of merchandise for resale.  She wishes to further develop her business and to increase her profits in order to improve her social and economic living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and clothes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for renovations, a coffee & hot drink machine, supplies and stock.

loans.name: Colque Patha Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “COLQUE PATHA” iniciará su decimo vigésimo quinto ciclo  en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Estefa. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: tienda de barrio, comerciante de ropa, venta de comida, venta de regalos, pollerería, punto de llamadas.

La señora Estefa,  indica que hace diez años que integra una asociación comunal en Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una amiga. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de punto VIVA (servicio de llamadas) que viene trabajando hace años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para la aumento de mercadería (compra de tarjetas telefónica por mayor), que adquirirá de la empresa y posteriormente lo instalará en su espacio comercial. Este negocio le ayuda a apoyar a su familia pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos
  
Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta compartir entre socias.
texts.en:
The “COLQUE PATHA” communal bank will begin their twenty-fifth loan with Pro Mujer as a part of the ‘Central Hub of the Andes’, it is made up of eight members and is managed by a committee headed by Mrs. Estefa. The businesses of the members of the communal bank are different and include a local grocery store, clothing store, food sales, gift sales, poultry shop, and a call center.

Mrs. Estefa has been a part of Pro Mujer for ten years; she became a member after a friend recommended the communal bank to her. At present, she has a business selling VIVA (a calling service) she has worked for several years in this trade.

The loan will be used to increase her merchandize (by buying calling cards wholesale) from the corporation that will be placed in her store. This business will help her support her family since she is married and has three children.

When asked what she enjoys of Pro Mujer, Mrs. Estefa says that she enjoys spending time with the other members.

loans.use: buy calling cards wholesale

loans.name: Mainor

texts.es: Mainor, tiene la edad  de 25 años, está soltero,  vive con la mama y el hermano mayor  actualmente. El con el crédito pretende comprar la semilla para realizar el almacigó y las bolsas para su realización, además comprar todos los insumos que se necesitan para la realización del almacigo como abonos y fumigaciones. El tiene pensado comprar  la semilla e insumos para poder hacer el almacigo de café para su posterior venta en el mercado de la localidad y alrededores, así poder  obtener más ganancias  para obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Mainor is 25 years old, single and lives with his mother and older brother. With the loan he wishes to buy seeds and bags to set up a raised bed and buy other materials needed to care for his crop like manure and fumigation. Mainor wants to buy seeds and materials to sow coffee and sell it in his local and surrounding markets to have more income, a better quality of life, and economic stability. This is his first loan through FUDECOSUR, he has not received any other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR gave him the loan easily with lower interest rates.

loans.use: buy seeds and bags to set up a raised bed and other materials.

loans.name: San Pablo Group

texts.es:
Este comité esta en el 1º ciclo del programa, esta integrado por 12 señoras, todas son vecinas, conocida de la zona, que se unieron con el objetivo de trabajar juntas y ayudarse las unas a lasotras. Las integrantes de este grupo son muy unidas y  responsables.
Eduvigis es una de las miembros del grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de bebidas de todo tipo, como ser gaseosas, vinos, cervvezsa y demás. Comenta que tiene una buena cantidad de clientes que siempre acuden a ella porque siempre tiene bien abastecido su negocio. Su meta es agrandar su local y de esa forma poder tener un mayor ingreso.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de cervezas, vinos, gaseosas y demás tipos de bebidas, con lo que podrá tener en stock y seguir ofreciendo variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
This is the first loan for this communal bank, it is made up of 12 women, all are neighbors and well known in the area. They got together with the goal of working and helping each other, they are very united and responsible.

Eduvigis is one of the members of this group; she sells all types of beverages like sodas, wines, beer and other drinks. She says that she has a good customer base since they always go to her because her business is well stocked. Her goal is to expand her store and have more income.

Eduvigis needs the loan to buy beers, wines, sodas and other types of drinks, this will help her increase her stock and to keep offering a variety of products to her customers.

loans.use: buy beers, wines, sodas and other types of drinks to sell.

loans.name: Oysha

texts.ru: Ойша жительница города Душанбе. Ей 46 лет. Она замужем. У нее один ребенок. Ойша портниха, она занимается шитьем национальных платьев у себя дома. Этим видом деятельности занимается девять лет. Кредит берет для покупки материалов и тканей.
texts.en: Oysha is a resident of the city of Dushanbe. She is 46 years old, married and has one child. Oysha is a seamstress and sews traditional Tajik dresses at home. She has been in this business for nine years. She is taking out the loan to buy materials and fabrics.

loans.use: to buy materials and fabrics.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
El señor Miguel tiene 52  años de edad, está casado con la Sra. Estelvina quien es comerciante, se dedica a la venta de comestibles, tienen tres hijos, por quienes ellos luchan.
Don Miguel se inicio hace mas de 27 años en el rubro de la mecánica y chapería, trabajando en aquel tiempo según comenta en uno de los talleres mecánicos más reconocidos de la ciudad, luego ingreso como mecánico en una empresa de de transporte, mas tarde habilito su taller propio en su casa en donde tiene todos los materiales para poder dar sus servicios de mecánico y chapista.
Solicita ayuda para la compra de un nuevo equipo de soldadura, ya que su clientela es exigente y lo elige por el buen servicio que ofrece. El agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo, pues le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Mr. Miguel is 52 years old, and is married to Mrs. Estelvina who sells foodstuffs; they have three children for whom they work very hard each day.

Mr. Miguel began his work as a mechanic and locksmith some 27 years ago. He says that his workshop is one of the most well known in the city, he started working as a mechanic in a transportation company and later started his own business in his home where he has all of the materials that he uses to work.

Mr. Miguel needs the loan to buy new soldering iron equipment since his customers are particular and choose him for the great service that he provides. He is grateful for the opportunity that is available to him since it will be of great help.

loans.use: buy a soldering iron.

loans.name: Sigrid Milena

texts.es: Sigrid Milena, tiene la edad  de 29 años, está casada,  vive con el esposo actualmente. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar  una vaca para leche, ella ya cuenta con otra vaca en su poder. Ella tiene pensado comprar una vaca mas para fortalecer el negocio de vender leche y queso y además empezar a vender también natilla, ella pretende vender sus productos  en el mercado de la localidad y alrededores, así poder  obtener más ganancias  para obtener una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Sigrid Milena is 29 years old, married and lives with her husband. With the loan she wants to buy a dairy cow, she already has one cow. The new cow will help her strengthen her business of selling milk and cheese and wants to start selling natilla (a type of custard) as well, she will sell her items in the local and surrounding markets to keep getting more income, have a better quality of life and economic stability. This is her first loan through FUDECOSUR, she has not received any other loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR gave her the loan easily with lower interest rates.

loans.use: buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Dana Kerti Group

texts.en:
Jro Ayu and the member of Dana Kerti group continue to take loans from MUK because they want to increase the number of their pigs and increase the income of their family.

Jro Ayu already has a local sow and used the new loan to purchase superior piglets and feed. Her husband supports her business because it’s increasing the income of their family. She hopes by pursuing this business, this business can grow and provide welfare for their family.

loans.use: To purchase superior piglets and feed

loans.name: Améyo

texts.fr:
Améyo est une femme âgée de 44 ans. Elle est mariée å un revendeur. Elle a 1 enfant de 6 ans qui va à l’école.
Améyo travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2009. Elle vend des trousseaux bébé et des produits cosmétiques pour tous clients à au marché. Elle achète les produits à Lomé. Elle vend seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la rupture de stock.
Améyo a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des trousseaux bébé et des produits cosmétiques. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Améyo voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité pour devenir grossiste. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Améyo is a 44-year-old woman She is married to a retail merchant. She has a 6-year-old child who goes to school.

Améyo has been working as a retailer since 2009. She sells baby outfits and cosmetics for all-comers at the local market. She buys her products in Lome. She sells by herself. At this time, her main problem is being out of stock.

Améyo requested her first loan from WAGES to buy baby outfits and cosmetics. She wants to reinvest in her business activity.

In coming years, Améyo would like to expand her business and become a wholesaler. She said that with the profits, she plans to take care of her family.

loans.use: Buy cosmetics and baby outfits

loans.name: Mulya Sari Group

texts.en:
Although the group earned enough profit in the last loan, they still need a new loan for their businesses because they have a strong will to have successful pig businesses. The loan will be used to improve their businesses by purchasing superior piglets or a sow.

Ni Ketut used the loan to buy three superior piglets. She has a plan to maintain them to become sows. She wants to become a piglet seller in her village. She hopes MUK and KIVA will always support her and the group, not only for the loan but for training also. Ni Ketut is on the right, wearing a white shirt.

loans.use: To purchase three superior piglets

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy  es socia del Bancomunal Virgen de Cocharcas, tiene 41 años de edad, es dueña de una tienda de golosinas y juguetes, es madre de 5 hijos, es casada, es socia de FINCA Perú hace más de 10 años, le gusta las capacitaciones que recibe en su Bancomunal por que le enseñan a cómo ahorrar, y distribuir sus ganancias, ya que en otras instituciones no le brindan capacitación, también le gusta asistir a sus reuniones porque le enseñan la puntualidad y responsabilidad,ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de juguetes y golosinas para venderlos por su negocio.
texts.en:
Nancy is a member of the Communal Bank "Virgen de Cocharcas". She is 41 years old and the owner of a candy and toy store. Nancy is married and the mother of five children. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for more than 10 years. She enjoys the training classes offered by her Communal Bank because they have taught her how to save and allocate her earnings. No other institutions provide training. In addition, Nancy enjoys attending the meetings because she has learned about punctuality and responsibility.

The loan she is requesting now will be invested in the purchase of toys and candy to sell in her business.

loans.use: to buy toys and candy to sell in her business.

loans.name: Awen Indah Group

texts.en:
The Awen Indah group received another loan from MUK. There are nine members and each member gets 1.5M IDR. These loans are used to support their pig businesses.

Ni Komang used this loan to buy a superior quality sow. She has a plan to become a piglet seller. She already has a local sow and the piglets are used for pig barbeque. The price today is Rp 450.000 per piglet. To reduce the cost of feed, Ni Komang is feeding with traditional feed made from banana stems and various kinds of leaves. Ni Komang pursues this effort to support the family's economy.

loans.use: To buy a superior quality sow

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.en: Gregorio raises pigs for a living. He is 52 years old and married with five children between the ages of 18 and 28 years old. Gregorio earns 15,000 PHP per month with his hog-raising business. He has requested a loan to purchase piglets, feed and vitamins. Gregorio hopes for this loan to help improve his business. Gregorio plans to pay for his children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase piglets, feed and vitamins

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase chemical fertilizers and pay for the cost of labor.

loans.name: Felina

texts.en:
Felina is 42 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Felina has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 10,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, milk, toasted bread, creamer & beverages.

Felina has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Felina hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, shampoo, soap and beverages

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
43-year-old Imelda buys and resells fruits and vegetables to her community. She is a married woman with seven children between 6 and 27 years old. Imelda has been in her business for 10 years. She sells bananas, sweet potatoes, and cassava to her community. She earns 2,000 PHP per month with her business.

Imelda is requesting a loan to buy more bananas and cassava to sell. She is hoping this loan will help to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more bananas and cassava to sell

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica is a seaweed farmer from Bien Unido, Bohol. She is 31 years old, married with five children with ages ranging from two to 12 years old. Jessica has been a seaweed farmer for six years. She earns about 8,000 PHP per month doing this farming.

Jessica has requested a loan to purchase straw, seaweed seedlings and other materials. Jessica hopes to have a good business and good health for her family. She also hopes to be able to sustain her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase straw, seaweed seedlings and other materials

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar is 57 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with two children. 

Edgar has a billiard shop in their community. He has had this business for five years. He requested a loan of 9,000 PHP to buy tools for the maintenance of the billiard shop like a soft broom, a stick broom, and a mat, to replace some damaged balls and sticks that are used in playing & to pay for the electricity for the services.

Edgar has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Edgar hopes to improve his business for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy tools for the maintenance of the billiard shop and replace balls and sticks

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
Angelita is 48 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with six children.
 
Angelita has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 9,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, milk, soap, detergents, shampoo & beverages.

Angelita has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Angelita hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, shampoo, milk and beverages

loans.name: Rodelia

texts.en:
Rodelia is 38 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Rodelia has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She has had this business for three years. She requested a loan for 8,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, detergents, shampoo, soap, eggs & beverages.

Rodelia has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Rodelia hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, shampoo, detergents, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Ma. Bona

texts.en:
Ma. Bona is a 40-year-old married woman with two children who are 13 and 14 years old. She is a seaweed farmer from Trinidad, Bohol. Ma. Bona earns 9,300 PHP per month doing this farming. She works hard to help provide for their household needs and sustain her children's education.

Ma. Bona has requested a loan to purchase seaweed seedlings, wooden pegs, and gasoline for the boat. Ma. Bona hopes for her business to grow and for her children to finish college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase seaweed seedlings, wooden pegs, and gasoline for the boat

loans.name: Melarda

texts.en:
Melarda is a 38-year-old married woman with four children who are 3, 8, 11 and 12 years old. Her husband is a fisherman.

Melarda owns and manages a sari-sari store business in Trinidad, Bohol. She sells various items like canned goods, instant noodles, and toiletries. Melarda earns 3,500 PHP per month with her business. She has applied for a loan to buy more items to sell such as canned goods, spices and toiletries. Melarda hopes for her business to grow and for her family's standard of living to improve.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as canned goods, spices and toiletries

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is 59 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 10 children. 

Rosita has a pigpen and sells grown and mature pigs. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 20,000 PHP to buy animal feed for the pigs, like Unifeed, Pigrolac and Purina.

Rosita became a member of HSPFI in 2012. In the future, Rosita hopes to improve her business so she can provide for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy animal feed like Purina, Pigrolac and Unifeed

loans.name: Bayantsagaan

texts.en:
Bayantsagaan, 36, runs a taxi business around Kherlen, an eastern boundary town. He lives with his wife and his 3 children on his plot of land. For over a decade he has been running his business. Last year he bought a truck for a freight transportation business to grow his family income, but it has been running not so successfully. 

His daughter Oyungerel plays traditional instrumental music and recently she won an award in the state musical competition. Two months from now she is going to Japan for an international music competition. It will be a little bit expensive for his family budget. Therefore Bayantsagaan decided to earn the extra money for his daughter’s travel and competition expenses in Japan. It is a very important thing for him and his daughter. He is planning to do it by repairing his taxi and running his business much more in the next 2 months. Also he needs money to repair and renovate his old house. It was built in the early 1980s, but since then it has not been renovated. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchasing spare parts for his car and building materials for the house renovation.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts for his car and building materials for the house renovation.

loans.name: Abed Al Wahab

texts.en:
Abdel Wahab is a 37-year-old married father of two children. He has been in the catering business for 17 years and is currently employed in a snack shop. The shop is unique in the area with regards to its offerings of Lebanese specialties such as Falafel, Ful and Hommus. Abdel Wahab is applying for a loan from Kiva’s Partner, Al Majmoua, to buy the required products, such as spices, meat, chicken, fish, oil and bread, and boost the snack’s service-capacity.

In the future, Abdel Wahab intends to buy the snack shop from its owner. In this way, he will be a business owner with a stable job. This is why he is keen on investing as much as possible in the store's growth. Generating more revenues will allow Abdel Wahab to earn more and thus become capable of fulfilling his household and family needs as well as accumulate income for his future plan.

loans.use: to buy food products such as meat, chicken, etc

loans.name: Abdallah

texts.en:
Abdallah is a 28-year-old single young man who has been running his car repair garage for more than 15 years. Abdallah was only 13`years old when he started working, the harsh childhood he had made him a wise predictive man who counts every step he's going to take, to avoid future problems.
Over the years, Abdallah has developed a wide base of customers with his perseverance, seriousness and high work ethics. 

He is applying for a second youth loan from Kiva’s Partner, Al Majmoua, to develop his business and renew his working tools and equipment. Abdallah’s need to have a sustainable business grew recently as he is getting ready for marriage.

loans.use: to renew his working tools and equipment

loans.name: Nader

texts.en:
Nader is 30 years old, married, and has one child. He has 12 years of experience in mechanics; four years ago, he opened his own shop for motorcycle sales and maintenance as well as car repairs and service. 

Nader is exceptional at fixing malfunctions and he provides a warranty for his work. His rare business in the area and his extensive experience and skills have helped him develop his wide customer base.

Nader is requesting a youth loan from Al Majmoua, which he will use to buy new and modern tools and equipment. In the future, he plans to expand his business and scope of work.

loans.use: to purchase new and modern tools and equipment.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 51-year-old married father of four children. He has owned a construction contracting business for more than 18 years, which eventually allowed him to start another business, mouneh (food storage, i.e. preserving food) for sale. Mahmoud developed his business-oriented mindset from his lifelong commercial experience. 

His intention now is to grow his mouneh trade into a small store for selling foodstuffs, through starting a small home made food section to develop it in the future to a catering department.  For this purpose, he is applying for a loan from Kiva’s Partner, Al Majmoua. Mahmoud aims at maintaining a stable businesses and continuously generating a sustainable income to maintain a good quality of living for himself and his family.

loans.use: to grow his mouneh trade business into a small store for selling foodstuffs, and special home made food

loans.name: Gbenonkpo Group

texts.fr: Le groupement GBENONKPO est composé de onze personnes qui résident dans la même agglomération et exercent des activités génératrices de revenus. C'est la première fois que ce groupement sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupement, du nom de Cica Héloïse Odile est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Cica Héloïse Odile est âgée de 43 ans. Cica Héloïse Odile est mariée à un certain Noubaï. Le couple a deux enfants, tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Cica Héloïse Odile a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaure. Pour subvenir à ses besoins, Cica Héloïse Odile vend de l’huile rouge et de produits divers et parallèlement à cette activité, Cica Héloïse Odile vend des savons dans sa région depuis une dizaine d’année. Cica Héloïse Odile s’approvisionne dans une ville du Benin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Cica Héloïse Odile sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement GBENONKPO, un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The GBENONKPO group consists of eleven persons residing in the same urban area who engage in revenue-generating activities. This is the first time the group is seeking financial assistance from ALIDé to raise the level of their business activities. The representative of the group, named Cica Heloise Odile is the one raising her hand in the picture.

Cica Odile Heloise is 43 years old and married to Noubaï. The couple has two children, both attending school and who are their dependents.

Cica Heloise Odile left school at secondary level. To support herself over the past ten years, she has been selling red palm oil and various other products. As a secondary activity, she has also been selling soap throughout her region. She gets her supplies in one of Benin's cities..

Seeking to satisfy her customers and wanting to increase her turnover and income, Cica Heloise Odile is seeking a loan from ALIDé, together with other members of the GBENONKPO group.

loans.use: Buy containers of red palm oil.

loans.name: Salam

texts.en:
Salam is a 29-year-old single young man who has been in the fruits and vegetable retail business for 10 years now. His father, Khalil, started the family grocery store 35 years ago and since then it has developed its great reputation and customer base.

Salam is applying for a youth loan from Kiva’s Partner, Al Majmoua, and he will use the money to repair and revamp his pick-up truck, since it helps him in transporting the goods from the wholesale market to his shop with less fees, this decrease in expenses, helps a lot in increasing his income. Salam also might use his truck to transport goods for others with  special competitive prices.  The loan is crucial to Salam as it will allow him to reorganize his business, save time and costs and work more efficiently.

loans.use: to repair and revamp his pick-up truck

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Abdukahor

texts.ru: Абдукахор проживает в городе Турсунзаде. Ему 41 год. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Он занимается выращиванием овощей. Этим видом деятельности занимается более 20 лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Abdukahor lives in the town of Tursun-zoda. He is 41 years old, married and has four children. He cultivates vegetables. He has been in this business for more than twenty years. He is taking out the loan to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Angel

texts.es: Ángel de 45 años es un hombre casado, que tiene dos hijos en las edades de 18 y 20 años de edad y vive en Puerto Colombia, un municipio ubicado  a la orilla del mar caribe, con un potencial turístico importante, en tanto muchas de las familias de Barranquilla y otras ciudades cercanas se trasladan allí, para disfrutar de su paisaje de playa brisa y mar y de las deliciosas comidas a base de pescado de mar, que se venden alrededor de la playa. Ángel desde hace 4 años, se dedica a  la venta de pescado, actividad que se ideó, después de haber experimentado vendiendo mercancía variada a crédito. Los proveedores principales de Ángel,  son los pescadores  del balneario de Puerto Velero, hermoso y  turístico lugar, donde este traslada  en una moto de su propiedad  y trasporta el pescado en cavas de plástico e icopor; cuando la pesca es abundante Ángel contrata  un carro para traer a Puerto Colombia su producto estrella. Los especímenes que mas comercializa son Sable, corvina, caritos, cojinúa, sierra, robalo, pargo, chivo, y langostino. Cuando hay subienda de pescado, Ángel distribuye entre varios vendedores para que ellos también comercialicen en su pueblo. La jornada laboral de Ángel inicia desde las 5:00 A.M. con un viaje a Puerto Velero y regresa a las 7:30 A.M. Luego hace los repartos y se desocupa a las 12:00 M.
